name: 莊淳淩
objective:
本課程旨在介紹供應鏈管理中之相關問題及議題 。其中包含產業分析、e 化概念、需求及供應管理、長鞭效應、存貨管理、延遲理論、及供應鏈管理實務。
The purpose of the course is to offer student a sound introduction of supply chain management relative issues. It includes industry analysis, E-business concept, demand and supply management, bullwhip effect, inventory management, postponement, and supply chain management practice.
schedule:
COURSE OUTLINE / CALENDAR
Understanding the Supply Chain (Chapter 1) 
Achieving Strategic Fit in a Supply Chain (Chapter 2) 
Supply Chain Drivers and Metrics (Chapter 3) 
Designing Distribution Networks and Applications to Omni-Channel Retailing (Chapter 4) 
Network Design in the Supply Chain (Chapter 5) 
Designing Global Supply Chain Networks (Chapter 6) 
Sales and Operations Planning in a Supply Chain (Chapter 9)
Managing Economies of Scale in a Supply Chain Cycle Inventory (Chapter 11)
Transportation in a Supply Chain (Chapter 14)
